channel.title: CVE Feed for vaadin -- vaadin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for vaadin -- vaadin

item.title: CVE-2020-36321|2024-08-04T17:23:10.431Z -- vaadin -- vaadin
item.description: Improper URL validation in development mode handler in com.vaadin:flow-server versions 2.0.0 through 2.4.1 (Vaadin 14.0.0 through 14.4.2), and 3.0 prior to 5.0 (Vaadin 15 prior to 18) allows attacker to request arbitrary files stored outside of intended frontend resources folder.

item.title: CVE-2020-36320|2024-08-04T17:23:10.443Z -- vaadin -- vaadin
item.description: Unsafe validation RegEx in EmailValidator class in com.vaadin:vaadin-server versions 7.0.0 through 7.7.21 (Vaadin 7.0.0 through 7.7.21) allows attackers to cause uncontrolled resource consumption by submitting malicious email addresses.

item.title: CVE-2020-36319|2024-08-04T17:23:10.530Z -- vaadin -- vaadin
item.description: Insecure configuration of default ObjectMapper in com.vaadin:flow-server versions 3.0.0 through 3.0.5 (Vaadin 15.0.0 through 15.0.4) may expose sensitive data if the application also uses e.g. @RestController
